metadata.feature_description: Receive notifications for various activity stream events

steps.action: Navigate to Community page and click SuperUser Account dropdown
steps.expected: Notification indicator should be visible showing notification count
steps.actual: Notification indicator showed '2 Notifications' with dropdown access

steps.action: Click 'See All' to view all notifications
steps.actual: Notifications list page opened showing Badge and Wiki notifications

steps.action: View notifications in the notification center
steps.expected: Badge notifications should appear for achievements
steps.actual: Badge notification 'Wikichievement' was visible showing 'Congratulations! You earned the Wikichievement badge.'

steps.action: View notifications in the notification center
steps.actual: Wiki notification was visible showing 'You have been granted Edit article metadata privilege.'

steps.action: Click 'Dismiss' button on a single notification
steps.expected: Notification should be removed from the list
steps.actual: Notification was successfully dismissed and removed from the list
Confirmation dialog appeared with checkbox 'Do not show this message again' and Continue/Cancel buttons
All notifications were cleared, showing empty notification list

steps.action: Navigate to Account Settings > Communications tab
steps.expected: Subscription management section should be visible
steps.actual: Manage Subscriptions section displayed with 56 subscriptions across 6 pages including Wiki Subscriptions and Post Updates

steps.expected: Notification frequency options should be visible
steps.actual: Email Delivery Schedule section expanded showing Notification Digest Frequency (Hourly) and Message Digest Frequency (Instant) dropdowns

steps.action: Change Notification Digest Frequency to 'Daily' and save
steps.actual: Setting changed to 'Daily' and saved. Confirmation message 'Your preferences have been updated.' appeared

steps.action: View Email Delivery Schedule with all frequency options
steps.expected: Multiple delivery frequency options should be available
steps.actual: Notification Digest Frequency options available: Instant, Daily, Hourly, Weekly, Never. Message Digest Frequency options: Instant, Daily, Hourly, Weekly, Never

steps.action: Click Unsubscribe button for a Wiki subscription item
steps.actual: Unsubscribe dialog appeared with 'Are you sure you want to unsubscribe?' message and Yes/No buttons

steps.expected: Subscription should be removed from the list
steps.actual: Item was unsubscribed successfully. Message 'You have been successfully unsubscribed.' appeared and item removed from list

observations: Notifications are displayed in a dropdown accessible from the SuperUser Account menu showing notification count
The notification center supports different notification types: Badge, Wiki, and activity-related notifications
The 'Dismiss All Notifications' feature includes a confirmation dialog with an option to suppress future confirmation messages
Email Delivery Schedule provides granular control over notification frequency with options: Instant, Daily, Hourly, Weekly, Never
Both Notification Digest and Message Digest frequencies can be configured independently
Subscription management shows a paginated list of all subscriptions with ability to unsubscribe
Code in ActivityStreamNotifications.cs shows notifications are sent via NewPostNotifications() and NewCommentNotifications() methods
Code shows notifications are subscription-based - users receive notifications based on their subscriptions to posts, walls, and activity streams
The notification system supports localization with language-grouped notification sending
